eu.focusnet.app.util

Class ApplicationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.focusnet.app.util.ApplicationHelper

  • public final class ApplicationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to retrieve application configuration and Android facilities.

    All these facilities should be accessed through this class, and not via the FocusAppLogic singleton.

      • getProperty

        public static java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key)
        Retrieve a property.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the property to retrieve
        Returns:
        A String containing the value of the property, or null on failure.

      • getProperty

        public static java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key,
                                           AssetManager assetManager)
        Same as getProperty(String), but used when no asset application is ready, yet
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the property to retrieve
        assetManager - Asset Manager
        Returns:
        A String containing the value of the property, or null on failure.

      • changeLanguage

        public static void changeLanguage(java.lang.String language)
        Load the proper language based on the value found in the AppContentInstance and modify the current Configuration. This method must be called when appropriate, but will impact all the rest of the life of the application. It does not impact the UI directly but is typically called from an Activity's on Resume() method, or just before redirecting to another Activity.

      • getSupportedLanguages

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSupportedLanguages()
        Get the list of languages for which we have a translation. This is hard-coded.
        Returns:
        An array consisting of supported languages. The languages can be also a localized versions, e.g. fr_CH instead of fr.

      • resetLanguage

        public static void resetLanguage()
        Reset language to the default language

      • getDefaultLocale

        private static java.util.Locale getDefaultLocale()
        Retrieve the default locale to use as a fallback.
        Returns:
        The Locale to use.

      • savePreferences

        public static void savePreferences(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> preferences)
        Save provided preferences into the SharedPreferences store.
        Parameters:
        preferences - A key-value pair set to save. All saved values are String.

      • getPreferences

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getPreferences()
        Get all values for the SharedPreferences store
        Returns:
        The complete set of preferences.

        public static void resetPreferences()
        Delete all values from the SharedPreferences

        Parameters:
        what - The name of the permission.
        Returns:
        true if the permission is granted, false otherwise.
